# Water Chemistry

```{r}
verticalData <- read_csv("Urban_Stream_2023_Site_Sample_Data_VP.csv")
```

```{r}
head(verticalData)
```

```{r}
pondIDs <- c("T106", "T108", "T109")
verticalSubData <- verticalData %>% 
  subset(Pond %in% pondIDs & Depth < 160)

numLabs <- c("July", "August")
names(numLabs) <- c("1", "2")
```


## GRAPHS

```{r Temperature}
verticalSubData %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Depth, y = Temperature, group = Pond, colour = Pond)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(Num), labeller = labeller(Num = numLabs))
```

```{r}
verticalSubData %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Depth, y = DO, group = Pond, colour = Pond)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(Num), labeller = labeller(Num = numLabs))
```

```{r}
verticalSubData %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Depth, y = Conductivity, group = Pond, colour = Pond)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(Num), labeller = labeller(Num = numLabs))
```

```{r}
verticalSubData %>% 
  subset(Pond %in% pondIDs & Depth < 160) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Depth, y = Turbidity, group = Pond, colour = Pond)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(Num), labeller = labeller(Num = numLabs))
```

## LINEAR MODELS

```{r}
tempDepthModel <- lm(Temperature ~ Depth, verticalSubData)
summary(tempDepthModel)
```

```{r}
doDepthModel <- lm(DO ~ Depth, verticalSubData)
summary(doDepthModel)
```

```{r}
turbDepthModel <- lm(Turbidity ~ Depth, verticalSubData)
summary(turbDepthModel)
```

# Invertebrates Data

```{r}
invertData <- read.csv("EEB397_InvertData.csv", row.names = 1)
```


```{r}
rank.abund <- function(x, name) {
  tmp <- x[name, ]
  tmp2 <- tmp[tmp > 0] / sum(tmp)
  tmp3 <- tmp2[order(-tmp2)]
cbind(rank = 1:length(tmp3), RA = log(tmp3 + 1)) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = rank, y = RA)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(y = "Relative Abundance", x = "Rank", title = paste("Pond", name)) +
  ylim(0,0.75)
}
```

```{r}
A1 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T106A1")
A2 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T106A2")
A3 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T106A3")

B2 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T106B2")
B3 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T106B3")
A4 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T108A1")
A5 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T108A2")
A6 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T108A3")
B4 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T108B1")
B5 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T108B2")
B6 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T108B3")
A7 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T109A1")
A8 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T109A2")
A9 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T109A3")
B7 <- rank.abund(invertData, "T109B1")

```
